My wife has been employed by Endeavour Energy
My wife and I have taken out a joint care loan with St George Bank.
Recently, while in the United Kingdom, I was a guest and reserved accommodation from Mr Nicholas Johnson, a family friend.
I received a bottle of Penfolds RWT Shiraz from the Property Council of Australia on Tuesday 27 May.
Contract & advance for book with Melbourne University Press
My wife has resigned her employment with Endeavour Energy.
On 16 September 2014 I travelled from Newman to Port Hedland on a charter flight at the expense of BHP Pty Ltd.
A Georg Jensen wine carafe: Wednesday 25 March, 2015, I received a wine carafe from the Executive Chairman of Evans + Partners, David Evans.
I attended the Boao Forum in China from Wednesday 25 March - Saturday 28 March as a guest of Fortescue Metals Group. Flights & accommodation were included.

disclosures.entity: Australia-Guangdong Chamber of Commerce and the Communist Party of China
disclosures.details: On 26 April 2015 I travelled to Hong Kong and China for five days as a guest of the Australia - Guangdong Chamber of Commerce and the Communist Party of China, with some additional accommodation. My wife accompanied me on this trip. I engaged in high level meetings with business and government officials.
On Saturday June 20, my daughter and I were guests at the NRMA at the "Five Seconds at Summer" concert in Sydney.
My wife has been employed by Tell The Dingo
On 05/09/15, whilst travelling on private business, I received a complimentary upgrade from Qantas Airways.
My wifes superannuation account has now acquired by AustralianSuper. My superannuation account remains with AustralianSuper by default fund.
On 25/26/October, I attended the Australia-India Dialogue Leadership Dialogue in New Delhi. My travel and accommodation costs were paid for by the Dialogue.
On 18 December 2015 I travelled to Singapore as a participant in the Singapore Government's "Distinguished visitor" program and a guest of the Singapore Government.
